articles.author: Jomy Jos Pullokaran
articles.title: United Spirits Q1 Results | Profit, revenue rise marginally; 'Prestige & Above' segment grows 10% - CNBCTV18
articles.description: United Spirits Q1 Results | Diageo-controlled liquor maker United Spirits Ltd reported a 1.7% year-on-year (YoY) increase in consolidated net profit at ₹485 crore. Shares of United Spirits Ltd ended at ₹1,330.25, up by ₹21.95, or 1.68%, on the BSE.
articles.content: Diageo-controlled liquor maker United Spirits Ltd on Tuesday (July 23) reported a 1.7% year-on-year (YoY) increase in consolidated net profit at 485 crore for the first quarter that ended June 30, 20… [+1871 chars]

articles.title: Tata Consumer announces rights issue to raise up to Rs 3,000 cr at Rs 818 per share: Here are the key... - Moneycontrol
articles.description: A total of 3,66,47,492 shares, aggregating up to Rs 2,997.77 crore, will be issued at a discount of 34.97 percent, the filing said

articles.title: Accenture Pioneers Custom Llama LLM Models with NVIDIA AI Foundry - Newsroom | Accenture
articles.description: Accenture today announced the launch of the Accenture AI Refinery™ framework, built on NVIDIA AI Foundry, to enable clients to build custom LLM models with the Llama 3.1 collection of openly available models, also introduced today.
articles.content: While enterprises are exploring the power of gen AI, they have to distill and refine the underlying LLM models with their own data and unique processes. The Accenture AI Refinery framework, which sit… [+4329 chars]

articles.title: PSU stocks mixed after Budget 2024 maintains capex outlay, skips rail allocation - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The government maintained capex unchanged at Rs 11.11 lakh crore for this fiscal year
